pull.title: Improve robustness of DER recoding code
pull.body:
Add some defensive programming on top of #5634.

This copies the respective OpenSSL code in ECDSA_verify in OpenSSL pre-1.0.1k (e.g. https://github.com/openssl/openssl/blob/OpenSSL_1_0_1j/crypto/ecdsa/ecs_vrf.c#L89) more closely.

As reported by @sergiodemianlerner.

repo.name: bitcoin
repo.description: Laanwj's Bitcoin Core fork - see README.md on "readme" branch

issue.title: Fix for OpenSSL 1.0.1k+
issue.body:
This is pulled from bitcoin/bitcoin#5634 . 

Fixes a problem when linking against the newest OpenSSL which can cause a fork. Note that this is only relevant for people compiling their own wallet.s Buildss on dogecoin.com are unaffected. So IMHO we don't need to push a full release for this. Just merge this into master and tag it. Objections?  

Thanks to @mxtm for the hint :)

events.message:
Improve robustness of DER recoding code

Add some defensive programming on top of #5634.

This copies the respective OpenSSL code in ECDSA_verify in
OpenSSL pre-1.0.1k (e.g. https://github.com/openssl/openssl/blob/OpenSSL_1_0_1j/crypto/ecdsa/ecs_vrf.c#L89)
more closely.

As reported by @sergiodemianlerner.

issue.title: Improve robustness of DER recoding code
issue.body:
Add some defensive programming on top of #781.

This copies the respective OpenSSL code in ECDSA_verify in
OpenSSL pre-1.0.1k (e.g. https://github.com/openssl/openssl/blob/OpenSSL_1_0_1j/crypto/ecdsa/ecs_vrf.c#L89) more closely.

As reported by @sergiodemianlerner.

Cherry-picked from bitcoin/bitcoin#5640

issue.title: Improve robustness of DER recoding code
Several patches
issue.body:
> This introduces the concept of the 'sync node', which is the one we
> asked for missing blocks. In case the sync node goes away, a new one
> will be selected.
> 
> For now, the heuristic is very simple, but it can easily be extended
> later to add better policies.

Same as https://github.com/novacoin-project/novacoin/commit/28f9882707d389250e307ebf58dcf981340f1381
Similar to https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/commit/6ed71b5e4faa2ea6d739eefa9c3dcc15db80439c
(I don't delete old sync code because it does conflict with nothing and that's OK "Ask the first connected node for block updates" before this node can be selected for block updates in net.cpp)
(Although I can remove old sync code if necessary.)
Issue description: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/1234
